title: ‘It Depends on My Health:’ Chloé Dygert Wins Bronze Despite Heavy Crash, Road Race Uncertain
content:
'I felt early I didn't have super legs': Dygert makes no excuses after crash foils her gold medal chances. Taylor Knibb also crashes on wet roads to finish 19th.

Read the full article at ‘It Depends on My Health:’ Chloé Dygert Wins Bronze Despite Heavy Crash, Road Race Uncertain on Velo.
author: ahood
